document.full_text: yohann diniz of france broke the world record in the 50,000-meter (about 31-mile) race walk by more than five minutes.
document.title: sports briefing | track and field: race-walk record set
lines_and_colors: yohann diniz of france broke the world record in the 50,000-meter (about 31-mile) race walk by more than five minutes.
